reactor.netty

Class ByteBufMono

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.core.publisher.Mono<O>
      • reactor.core.publisher.MonoOperator<ByteBuf,ByteBuf>
        • reactor.netty.ByteBufMono
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Publisher<ByteBuf>, CorePublisher<ByteBuf>, Scannable

    public class ByteBufMono
extends MonoOperator<ByteBuf,ByteBuf>
    A decorating Mono NettyInbound with various ByteBuf related operations.
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini

      • asInputStream

        public final Mono<InputStream> asInputStream()
        Convert to an InputStream inbound Mono

        Note: Auto memory release is disabled. The underlying ByteBuf will be released only when InputStream.close() is invoked. Ensure InputStream.close() is invoked for any terminal signal: complete | error | cancel

        Returns:
        a InputStream inbound Mono

      • retain

        public final ByteBufMono retain()
        Disable auto memory release on each signal published in order to prevent premature recycling when buffers are accumulated downstream (async).
